body: Every artist was first an amateur
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

body: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up
author: Pablo Picasso

body: You don’t take a photograph you make it
author: Ansel Adams

body: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time
author: Thomas Merton

body: We don’t make mistakes just happy little accidents
author: Bob Ross

body: Have no fear of perfection you’ll never reach it
author: Salvador Dali

body: You can’t wait for inspiration you have to go after it with a club
author: Jack London
